title: MaryRuth Organics, Megadose Vitamin D3 Organic Liquid Drops, Pineapple , 1 fl oz (30 ml)
cleaned_text: Pineapple , 1 fl oz (30 ml) - Date First Available: April 2023 - Shipping Weight: 0.09 kg - Package Quantity: 29.57 Dimensions: 11.7 x 5.2 x 3.6 cm , 0.09 kg Product rank: [Vitamin D](/c/vitamin-d?sr=2)> Product overview Description - USDA Organic - Non GMO - Vegan - Each Serving 500% Daily Value - A Dietary Supplement - Certified Organic by Organic Certifiers - Antioxidant* - Bone Health - Immune Support - Healthy Mood What is the vegan D3 sourced from? Our D3 is take a megadose of Vitamin D? Megadosing is a term to describe taking doses well over the regular daily recommended dosage of a vitamin. Limited studies have shown benefits to megadosing with specific vitamins and minerals but we always recommend that everyone check with their physician or healthcare professional before beginning any new wellness supplement to make sure the supplement is suitable for their health. *Vitamin D Suggested use No refrigeration necessary. This product was formulated for ages 14+. Shake gently before use. Once daily, take up to 1 mL (50 drops**) directly by mouth, or dose as recommended by a physician or healthcare professional. Please avoid direct dropper contact to mouth in order to prevent product contamination. **1 pump typically fills 0.7 mL or 35 drops. Dropper for illustrative purposes only. Actual pipette is unmarked. Other ingredients Organic medium chain triglyceride (mct) oil, organic natural pineapple flavor. Warnings Keep out of reach of children because of accidental overdose or choking. Pregnant and lactating women & seniors over 65 should always consult with a physician or healthcare professional prior to use.
